participant_abstract.sent: In our final meeting we discussed wether this remote could be produced within our budget.
The answer to that was yes.
We also took a look at the proto-type to ensure it was meeting all critera and expectations.
On the whole the project was successful and we all agreed that the product was a go.

participant_actions.sent: Prodcution is the next step and overseeing quality is of course the most important thing we can all do.

participant_decisions.sent: Most decisons were made prior to this meeting and we just took a look at finaces and the proto-type.
All were in agreement to go to production.
